Post.title: -jsonkey
Dockermysql
Post._content:
## 

* Ubuntu18.04

* Docker19.03.1

* Mysql5.7

  

## Docker

### 

  DockerDockerHubDockerFile

```shell
sudo docker pull mysql:5.7			//
```

mysql:5.75.7mysqlmysqlmysql

![](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/dockerpullmysql.png)



### 

```shell
sudo docker images		//
```

![](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/dockerimages.png)



### 

#### 

```shell
sudo docker run -d -p 3306:3306 --name mysql5.7 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root mysql:5.7
```

* -d       
* -p          :
* --name    
* -e        

![](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/dockerrun.png)

id

#### 

```shell
sudo docker ps -a
```

* -a        

![](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/dockerps.png)

## Mysql

### 

```shell
sudo docker exec -it mysql5.7 bash
```

* -i        STDIN
* -t        tty

![](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/dockerexec.png)

### mysql

```shell
mysql -uroot -p
```

MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD

### 

```sql
create database test;
```

### mysql

```sql
create user 'zmh'@'%' identified by 'zmh';
```

"%"ip

### mysql

```sql
alter user 'zmh' identified by 'zmh';
```

### 

testzmh

```sql
grant all privileges on test.* to 'zmh'@'%';
```

### 

```sql
flush privileges;
```

mysql

```sql
exit
```

### 

![](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/sqlclient.png)





## 

mysql

* sudo docker start mysql5.7       mysql5.7
* sudo docker stop mysql5.7        mysql5.7
* sudo docker restart mysql5.7   mysql5.7

Post.title: Jenkins-(Docker)
Post._content:
## 

- [Jenkins-(Docker)](https://mjava.top/jenkins/build-jenkins-docker/)

## 

- 172.16.54.131

- Cnetos 7

## Docker-CE

### Docker

DockerDocker

```shell
docker -v
```

> Docker version 19.03.4, build 9013bf583aDocker

### 

- centos7

Docker

```shell
yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2

yum-config-manager \
    --add-repo \
    https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
    
yum install docker-ce

service docker start

systemctl enable docker
```

-  
- docker-ce
- docker-ce
- docker
- 

## JenkinsDocker

### 

Jenkins

```shell
mkdir /opt/jenkins     			//
chmod 7777 /opt/jenkins			//
```

> docker

### 

```shell
docker pull jenkins/jenkins:lts
```

### 

```shell
docker run -d -p 8080:8080 -p 50000:50000 -u root -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v $(which docker):/usr/bin/docker -v /opt/jenkins:/var/jenkins_home -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime -e JAVA_OPTS=-Duser.timezone=Asia/Shanghai --restart=always --name jenkins jenkins/jenkins:lts
```

> rootdockerdocker/var/run/docker.sock$(which docker)dockerjenkinsdocker 

### 

```shell
docker logs jenkins 
```

![log](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/jenkins_docker_logs_4345.png)
> 43455b344f904cf69a4af9e231f7d48d

Post.title: docker
Post._content:
## 

  x86_64dockerARM



##  APTdocker

  apt GPG 

```shell
$sudo apt-get update
$sudo apt-get install \
	 apt-transport-https \
     ca-certificates \
     curl \
     gnupg2 \
     lsb-release \
     software-properties-common
$curl -fsSL https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/docker-ce/linux/raspbian/gpg | sudo apt-key add -
```



## docker ce 

* 

  ```shell
  $ echo $(lsb_release -cs)
  stretch
  ```

* /etc/apt/sources.list.ddocker.list

  ```shell
  $ sudo vi /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list
  ```

* 

  ```shell
  deb [arch=armhf] https://download.docker.com/linux/raspbian $(lsb_release -cs) stable
  ```

* $(lsb_release -cs)stretch

  ```shell
  deb [arch=armhf] https://download.docker.com/linux/raspbian stretch stable
  ```

* 

  

## docker ce

  

```shell
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install docker-ce
```



## 

```shell
$ service docker start           
$ service docker stop            
$ service docker status          
$ service docker restart         
```

## 

  x86_64dockerARM



##  APTdocker

  apt GPG 

```shell
$sudo apt-get update
$sudo apt-get install \
	 apt-transport-https \
     ca-certificates \
     curl \
     gnupg2 \
     lsb-release \
     software-properties-common
$curl -fsSL https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/docker-ce/linux/raspbian/gpg | sudo apt-key add -
```



## docker ce 

* 

  ```shell
  $ echo $(lsb_release -cs)
  stretch
  ```

* /etc/apt/sources.list.ddocker.list

  ```shell
  $ sudo vi /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list
  ```

* 

  ```shell
  deb [arch=armhf] https://download.docker.com/linux/raspbian $(lsb_release -cs) stable
  ```

* $(lsb_release -cs)stretch

  ```shell
  deb [arch=armhf] https://download.docker.com/linux/raspbian stretch stable
  ```

* 

  

## docker ce

  

```shell
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get install docker-ce
```



## 

```shell
$ service docker start           
$ service docker stop            
$ service docker status          
$ service docker restart         
```

Post.title: JDK
Post._content:
dockeroracle,nginx,tomcat;8linux

---

* ,

```shell
cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime
```

docker8

---

* 

```shell
vi /etc/sysconfig/clock
```



```shell
ZONE="Asia/Shanghai"
UTC=false
ARC=false
```

,

---

* TZ

> /etc/profile  ,home.bashrcdocker.bashrc.bashrc

```shell
export TZ='CST-8'
```



```shell
source .bashrc
```





---

## 

jdknew Date()jdkdockerjdknew Date()TZTZTimeZoneTimeZoneUTC+0),new Date()8

Post.title: RocketMQ
Post._content:
RocketMQ();



## 

- JDK1.8
- Centos7



## -

- centos7_1 :172.16.54.130
- centos7_2 :172.16.54.128



## 

- JDK1.8 :https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html
- RocketMQ4.5.2 :http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/apache/rocketmq/4.5.2/rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release.zip



## JDK

  JDK1.8



## RocketMQ

  RocketMQ:

  ```shell
# unzip rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release.zip
  ```

### 

  RocketMq:

```properties
# 
brokerClusterName=rocketmq-cluster

#brokermasterslave
brokerName=broker-a

#0  Master>0  Slave
brokerId=0 

#ip
brokerIP1 = IP

#nameServer
namesrvAddr=IP:9876;IP:9876

#topic 
defaultTopicQueueNums=4

# Broker Topic 
autoCreateTopicEnable=true

# Broker  
autoCreateSubscriptionGroup=true

#Broker  
listenPort=10911

# 4
 deleteWhen=04

# 48  
fileReservedTime=120

#commitLog1G 
mapedFileSizeCommitLog=1073741824

#ConsumeQueue30W
mapedFileSizeConsumeQueue=300000

#
diskMaxUsedSpaceRatio=88

#
storePathRootDir=/usr/local/rocketmq/store
#commitLog  
storePathCommitLog=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/commitlog
#
storePathConsumeQueue=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/consumequeue
#
storePathIndex=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/index
#checkpoint 
storeCheckpoint=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/checkpoint

#Broker 
#- ASYNC_MASTER Master
#- SYNC_MASTER Master
#- SLAVE 
brokerRole=ASYNC_MASTER

#
#- ASYNC_FLUSH 
#- SYNC_FLUSH  flushDiskType=ASYNC_FLUSH
#checkTransactionMessageEnable=false

#abort 
abortFile=/usr/javawork/apache-rocketmq/store/abort

# maxMessageSize=65536
```

RocketMQconf

- 2m-2s-async :2master2slaveasync
- 2m-2s-sync :2master2slavesync
- 2m-noslave :2master,slave

async

#### centos7_1

> masterslave

##### broker-a.properties

```properties
brokerClusterName=DefaultCluster
brokerName=broker-a
brokerId=0
deleteWhen=04
fileReservedTime=48
brokerRole=ASYNC_MASTER
flushDiskType=ASYNC_FLUSH
namesrvAddr=172.16.54.128:9876;172.16.54.130:9876
listenPort=10911
#
storePathRootDir=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store
#commitLog  
storePathCommitLog=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/commitlog
#
storePathConsumeQueue=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/consumequeue
#
storePathIndex=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/index
#checkpoint 
storeCheckpoint=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/checkpoint
```

*1091110909,10912*

##### broker-a-s.properties

```properties
brokerClusterName=DefaultCluster
brokerName=broker-a
brokerId=1
deleteWhen=04
fileReservedTime=48
brokerRole=SLAVE
flushDiskType=ASYNC_FLUSH
namesrvAddr=172.16.54.128:9876;172.16.54.130:9876
listenPort=20911
#
storePathRootDir=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store
#commitLog  
storePathCommitLog=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/commitlog
#
storePathConsumeQueue=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/consumequeue
#
storePathIndex=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/index
#checkpoint 
storeCheckpoint=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/checkpoint
```

*2091120909,20912*



#### centos7_2

##### centos7_1brokerNamebroker-b



## RocketMQJVM()

> RocketMQ8G

  rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release/binrunbroker.shrunserver.sh

- runbroker.sh

```properties
JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms8g -Xmx8g -Xmn4g"


JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms512m -Xmx512m -Xmn256m"
```

- runserver.sh: 

```properties
JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms4g -Xmx4g -Xmn2g -XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=320m"


JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms512m -Xmx512m -Xmn256m -XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=320m"
```



## RocketMQ

> RocketMQ
>
> ```shell
> # service firewalld stop
> ```
>
> 

  rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release/bin

- namesrv

```shell
# nohup sh mqnamesrv &
```

- broker-master

```shell
# nohup sh mqbroker -c ../conf/2m-2s-async/broker-a.properties &
```

- broker-slave

```shell
# nohup sh mqbroker -c ../conf/2m-2s-async/broker-a-s.properties &
```

*broker-c*



## Console

  Consolehttps://github.com/apache/rocketmq-externalsgit

```shell
# git clone https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-externals.git
```



```shell
# cd rocketmq-externals-master/rocketmq-console
```



```shell
# vim src/main/resources/application.properties
```

namesvrip

```properties
rocketmq.config.namesrvAddr=172.16.54.128:9876;172.16.54.130:9876
```



```shell
# mvn sprint-boot:run
```



![Console](http://cdn.mjava.top/blog/rocketmq_console.png)

date: 2019-10-09 20:55:36
password:
summary:
